name: Chen Chen 0022
content: Chen Chen Chen Chen Home Publications Teaching Services Chen Chen Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science University of Virginia Office: Rice Hall, Room 308 85 Engineers Way, Charlottesville, VA 22904 Mail: PO Box 400740, Charlottesville VA 22904 Email: zrh6du at virginia dot edu Short Bio I am an Assistant Professor at University of Virginia, Department of Computer Science. Before that, I was a Research Assistant Professor at Biocomplexity Institute, and a software engineer at Google. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science at Arizona State University under the supervision of Professor Hanghang Tong in 2019, my M.Sc degree from New York University in 2013 and B.Eng degree from Beihang University in 2011, both majored in Computer Science. Research Interests Graph Machine Learning Computational Epidemiology Network Science Honors and Awards 2024: University of Virginia Outstanding Researcher 2021: WSDM Outstanding Reviewer 2019: EECS Rising Star 2018: KDD Student Travel Award 2017: SBP-BRiMS Doctor Consortium Student Travel Award 2016: Bests of KDD 2016 2016: KDD Student Travel Award 2015: ICDM Student Travel Award 2015: Bests of SDM 2015 2015: SDM Student Travel Award Page revised 2025-8-20 US Eastern Time, by jemdoc.
